consistent.translation[0].definitions[0]: always behaving in the same way or having the same attitudes, standards etc – usually used to show approval
She’s the team’s most consistent player.
We need to be consistent in our approach.
consistent.translation[0].definitions[1]: continuing to happen or develop in the same way
a consistent improvement in the country’s economy
consistent.translation[0].definitions[2]: a consistent argument or idea does not have any parts that do not match other parts
